name: webpack-esmodule-example
description: Using webpack for both modern and legacy browsers, at the same time.

scripts.build: DISABLE_V8_COMPILE_CACHE=1 webpack --config=webpack.config.prod.cjs # Remove DISABLE_V8_COMPILE_CACHE after fixing https://github.com/webpack/webpack-cli/issues/1622
scripts.build:modern: DISABLE_V8_COMPILE_CACHE=1 webpack --config=webpack.config.prod.cjs --config-name=modern # Remove DISABLE_V8_COMPILE_CACHE after fixing https://github.com/webpack/webpack-cli/issues/1622
scripts.build:legacy: DISABLE_V8_COMPILE_CACHE=1 webpack --config=webpack.config.prod.cjs --config-name=legacy # Remove DISABLE_V8_COMPILE_CACHE after fixing https://github.com/webpack/webpack-cli/issues/1622
scripts.build:index-without-config: merge-html target/production/index-modern.html target/production/index-legacy.html > target/index-without-config.html && rimraf target/production/index-modern.html target/production/index-legacy.html
scripts.dev:modern: DISABLE_V8_COMPILE_CACHE=1 webpack serve --config=webpack.config.dev.cjs --config-name=modern # Remove DISABLE_V8_COMPILE_CACHE after fixing https://github.com/webpack/webpack-cli/issues/1622
scripts.dev:legacy: DISABLE_V8_COMPILE_CACHE=1 webpack serve --config=webpack.config.dev.cjs --config-name=legacy # Remove DISABLE_V8_COMPILE_CACHE after fixing https://github.com/webpack/webpack-cli/issues/1622
